data.text: Joma kare tho, to onge ngʼama wachno chando e chunye,
Joma timbegi ni kare yudo kwe;
“To un, biuru un yawuot jojuogi,
En ngʼa ma ujaro? En ngʼa mutingʼorene malo
Uoworu gi gombo manono ka un e tiend yiend ober
Kar dak mar nyisecheni ni e kind hoho
Iseloso kitanda mari kama otingʼore gi malo;
E tok dhoutu kod ewi sirni
Ne uterone ruoth Molek mo zeituni
Kata nobedo ni timbegi mamono duto nooli kamano;
“En ngʼatno ma chunyu ogeno ahinya kendo uluoro,
Abiro nyiso ayanga timbeu makare kod tijeu,
We ane nyisecheni manonogo okonyi sa ma inie chandruok!
Kendo enowach niya:
Nimar ma e gima Jal Man Malo Moloyo
Ok anabed ka adhawo ndalo duto,
Ne akecho gi timbene mamono ma ok rum,
Aseneno yorene to kata kamano abiro change;
ka achiwo wende pak e dho jo-Israel man-gi kuyo.
To joricho chalo gi nam moduwore,
Nyasacha wacho niya,
